title: CLR Guide to Dining
name: CLR Guide to Dining
description:
A Map by Clr

CLR guide to dining options in and around Portland State University. Guide covers food carts to fine dining options and everything in between. Most locations walkable or within fareless square free downtown  public transportation zone.

properties.name: Andina
properties.description: Posted by Edbogus 1314 NW Glisan, Portland, OROne of Portland\'s finest restaurants. This Peruvian eatery combines imaginative cuisine (fave bean flan) with a lively ambience complete with South American Music. Five stars

properties.name: Andina (33608$)
properties.description: Posted by Clr1314 NW Glisan, Portland, ORPeruvian dining in the Pearl District. Short walk from the street car.

properties.name: Baan Thai (33600)
properties.description: Posted by ClrGreat and occasionally fiery thai food. Can be busy/slow at lunch. Salad rolls are a meal in themselves.

properties.name: Paccini's (Bar and Restraunt)(33615)
properties.description: Posted by ClrCLR\'s favorite friday evening hang out... Good salads and sandwiches. Full bar around back with some outdoor seating.

properties.name: Pho Van (33609)
properties.description: Posted by ClrFresh and tasty vietnamese food. Best bets are for uninitiated are pho and bun. Great salad options too.
